attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My electoral voting form is in the process of being changed !

I now will have English as an option,as opposed to British,

local government response to question :

If I have understood correctly, you are claiming English nationality as opposed to British. Under the circumstances, if you feel that you need to change any of the pre-printed details on the form before signing and returning it, please do so. We will reflect your preference in any future correspondence.

Yours sincerely,
Ray Amesbury

Senior Democratic Services Manager,

Babergh District Council,

phone no removed, but you can email them to change yours,let me know how many people do,
I'm fed up with not being allowed to be ENGLISH,it's no problem for the Scots Irish or Welsh.
thay even get their own parliament,we dont.
